Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Lovely bar, restaurant area is good for proper dining. Bar area is great, big windows for people watching. Lovely food and snacks. Highly recommend the schrimp croquet.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Lovely spot with warming soups, various home made sandwiches and very good vibe.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Relaxed casual cafe and happily recommend. We had BLTC sandwiches. The bacon and Turkey topped the lettuce and delicious tomatoes. Presentation was beautiful. The latte wasnt too strong which what I wanted. Service was a little slow but the waitress did apologize. Toilets were small and clean

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Service was amazing. Our waitress spoke perfect English. Sat outside with a view of the botanical gardens. The lunch sandwiches turn simple concepts into delicious plates. Perfect stop after visiting the zoo.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Friendly staff, quick service and great food, all very reasonably priced. Would definitely come again.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text:
Located in the corner with beautiful view. Just 5 minute walking from Artis Park.
They have foods and beer. You can also smoke out side.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text:
Nice atmosphere in this great place.
Gorgeous food

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Excellent coffee with apple pie. The location is very good to sit outside. Strongly recommended.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Nice, cozy place. Great service and a friendly atmosphere! Definitely a place to check out, on a busy Thursday and even on a lazy sunday. Food is good and beer selection is excellent.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Really lovely stop for brunch on a sunny Sunday morning. Spoke really good English and the service was very good. The food was traditional but x10. Came here with kids and one of the children wanted a tostie but with bacon and the waitress ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Perfect place for a quick snack around the botanical garden. This seems to predominantly be a pub, but they serve good espresso and lunch items too. The atmosphere was very cozy, and the staff were friendly.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Very nice establishment! Very friendly helpful staff! Highly recommended! ‚ò∫

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: We just stopped in here on our way to the Resistance Museum.  It was friendly, delicious and terrific.  We each had a sandwich that was delicious -- probably because of great bread and simple ingredients.  In addition to the food and drink, ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text:
Despite being a nice and cozy place, service was extremely slow - we have to wait over an hour for our meals. Cuisine does not correspond the prices.
However, it may be a good place if you plan only to have drink or coffee.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Excellent, unpretentious bar/cafe. Good beer great atmosphere and music, welcoming and friendly staff. A great spot to pass a couple of hours with a glass of beer or two.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Visited from Scotland, really nice relaxed atmosphere playing classical piano music. Had a lovely Tuna Melt, just the right portion size. Evening menu looks tip-top too.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Yes from de canadas, very good food here in dutchland, chees very good point! Top food! Would eat again very nice family people feeling.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Awesome neighborhood cafe with great food and service. Pretty sure if Jim Morrison were still alive he would be a regular. Friendly staff and chill atmosphere. Don't forget to order a slice of apple pie.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Great irish coffee, great little sun spot, but it was much better when they had the burger on the lunch menu. They need to bring it back and i will start going back more often!

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text:
A very nice cafe against the corner of the botanical garden. The place is exceptionally calm.
We stopped here to drink coffee and beer.
Service and coffee are good.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Cosy little restaurant. We stopped in for lunch on a rainy Tuesday and got the chicken sandwich and the vegetable salad - both of which where yummy and reasonably priced. Staff were very friendly.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Fabulous low key restaurant. I can honestly say it was the nicest food I had whilst staying for the weekend in Amsterdam.  Staff were lovely and the local craft beer was gorgeous

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: I love this place. They have a great selection of non alcoholic drinks like Bionade and Wostok. The lunch service is fast, delicious and affordable. Most sandwiches are around 6.50.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Overall great experience. Stopped in for a drink and a quick snack. Food that people ordered looked really good. Would definitely recommend.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Great little spot and amazing service

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Randomly found this cafe and had good night experience drinking with some nice people. The owner is really friendly üòÄüëç

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: The food wasn't anything special but the atmosphere and waitress were nice. Probably a fun place to have a beer, they get really busy in the evenings.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Great cafe. Came in here one freezing day in Feb and had a fantastic bowl of Erwtwnsoep with very good bread. Very cosey. Gezellig.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Love this place. Never ever placing any reviews but this place is awesome. Lovely staff, great food ‚ù§

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Beautiful spot for a coffee, some food, beer, or apple tart/pie. Highly recommend it.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Came here a few times on a recent visit to Amsterdam as if was very near to our hotel. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: The atmosphere is very nice and the staff are friendly.  Unfortunately, I ordered a pork chop that arrived undercooked, so I wasn't too happy with the food.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text:
Genuinely cozy place, delicious food with good service and decent prices.
Super friendly owner/waiter.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text:
Desserts are home-made and delicious !
Very cosy caf√©, the bartender is careful and adorable.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Had lunch there and the staff were very friendly and accommodating. I was happy to find vegan options on the menu :)

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Very friendly and good food making nice memories.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Stopped by for a drink and cake. Lovely to sit out on the street and watch the world go by. Lovely big portion of cheesecake

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Lovely place with really nice staff! Also, when the sun is shining, it‚Äôs great to sit outside and watch the world go by.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Nice "old" cafe. A place for locals also. Good friendly service.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Very nice place. Great food, excellent staff. Definetely recommended

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Great food, very good service, nice selection of beers, definitly recomend

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Stopped for a quick beer while exploring the city. Good selection, and the staff was very friendly!

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Superb apple pie with whipped cream. Well-made coffee drinks. Very good tuna melt.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Nice neighborhood cafe bar

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Dropped in for a late afternoon snack on our first day in Amsterdam once we had checked in. Excellent food, super friendly staff.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Nice place for a quick lunch, close to some of the museum's and touristic spots.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Good friendly staff. Good sortiment of beer at reasonable prices. Recommended.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Excellent, great service good food. Wonderful atmosphere

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Nice neighbourhood bar, good beers, great food, nice people, relaxed, good gin selection

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Lovely corner cafe. Great food and service and quiet  and relaxing place to take a break.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Always super cosy with great food, service and beer selection.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: I was not a fan of the attitude and (slow) speed of the service. They don't appear to check the outside seating very often.

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Good food, good beer, friendly efficient service. What more could you ask for?

Name: Cafe Smit & Voogt
Review Text: Location is amazing. Service is good but nothing out of this world. What it has to ne, where it has to be.
